bibl.title: Variation in Private Letters: The Papyri of the Apollonios Strategos Archive.
bibl.note: 1. Introduction. - 2. The archive of Apollonios strategos. - 3. Uniformity and variation in the epistolary language of the archive: 3.1. Variation in the initial health wish; - 3.2. Uniformity in the epistolary formulas. - Conclusion. - Avec résumé en anglais.

1. Introduction. - 2. The archive of Apollonios strategos. - 3. Uniformity and variation in the epistolary language of the archive: 3.1. Variation in the initial health wish; - 3.2. Uniformity in the epistolary formulas. - Conclusion. - Avec résumé en anglais.
